short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disguise 𝕏 (twitter) to look like a PDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension makes 𝕏 (twitter) look like a PDF file.

It is lightweight and easy to use. You can toggle pictures, other media and the 𝕏 (twitter) interface with buttons or keyboard shortcuts:
Toggle media: alt+x
Toggle UI: alt+c

You can make 𝕏 (twitter) look like a PDF file so overly curious coworkers, bosses or other people  do not see how you spend your time exactly =)
